channel.title: Culture / Music on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Culture / Music on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The Song of the Summer Is Dead
item.description: In an age of wavering consensus and widening divisions, music reflects the times more than ever. One factor missing from the discussion of this year’s song of the summer? The Donald Trump of it all.

item.title: The Song of the Summer Is Dead
item.description: In an age of wavering consensus and widening divisions, music reflects the times more than ever. One factor missing from the discussion of this year’s song of the summer? The Donald Trump of it all.

item.title: What JD Vance, Pam Bondi, and Sam Altman Can’t Stop Listening To, According to the ‘Panama Playlists’
item.description: A new website claims to know the Spotify listening habits of Trump officials, tech leaders—and even journalists. Attorney General Pam Bondi allegedly jams out to Nelly’s “Hot in Herre."

item.title: What JD Vance, Pam Bondi, and Sam Altman Can’t Stop Listening To, According to the ‘Panama Playlists’
item.description: A new website claims to know the Spotify listening habits of Trump officials, tech leaders—and even journalists. Attorney General Pam Bondi allegedly jams out to Nelly’s “Hot in Herre."

item.title: Anime Girl VTubers Are Selling Out Concerts, but Are They ‘Real?’ Depends on Who You Ask
item.description: Virtual anime streamers are selling out live venues, singing at pro sports games, and launching record labels, with fans showering them with presents and suspending disbelief in service of the bit.

item.title: The Ultimate Dolby Atmos Experience Might Be In Your Car
item.description: After two weeks of listening to Dolby Atmos Music in Cadillac’s fancy electric SUV, I never want to go back to two-channel audio.
